column1: When Chuck Norris was denied a Bacon McMuffin at McDonalds because it was 10:35"
column2:
he roundhouse kicked the store so hard it became a KFC.
Some people wear Superman pajamas. Superman wears Chuck Norris pajamas.
Chuck Norris doesn't shower, he only takes blood baths.
Chuck Norris is not Politically Correct. He is just Correct. Always.

Why can't bicycles stand on their own? answer: They are two tired
What do you call a singing Laptop? answer: A Dell
What's the best thing about a Boolean? answer: Even if you're wrong
column3:
you're only off by a bit.
